ygData.subject: RE: world Server question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The last interview with Brad McQuaid I read quoted him as saying that this was entirely a rumor, that they (Verant) had never even entertained the idea,
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Sam Powell" <sam@ti.l-3com.com>
>
>
>Rumor I heard was GM's might allow this on a case by case basis after the
>person performed a quest, but it seems to me this would just add to the
>GM's
>already overworked schedule, so I doubt it will take place.
>

The last interview with Brad McQuaid I read quoted him as saying that this
was entirely a rumor, that they (Verant) had never even entertained the
idea, nor would it be implemented because it would cause too many problems.
